com.interpss.core.net

Interface Substation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.hazelcast.nio.serialization.DataSerializable, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, NameTag, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SubstationImpl

    public interface Substation
extends NameTag
    A representation of the model object 'Substation'. A name tagged element for the Substation concept.

    The following features are supported:

    • Network
    • Volt Level
    • Bus List
    • Nb Node List
    • Nb Switch List
    • Nb Equip Connect List
    See Also:
    NetPackage.getSubstation()

      • getNetwork

        Network<?,?> getNetwork()

      • setNetwork

        Parameters:

        See Also:
        getNetwork()

      • getVoltLevel

        double getVoltLevel()
        Returns the value of the 'Volt Level' attribute. The default value is "0.0". Substation voltage level in volts, defined as the highest bus base voltage in the substation
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Volt Level' attribute.
        See Also:
        setVoltLevel(double), NetPackage.getSubstation_VoltLevel()

      • setVoltLevel

        void setVoltLevel(double value)
        Sets the value of the 'Volt Level' attribute.
        Parameters:
        value - the new value of the 'Volt Level' attribute.
        See Also:
        getVoltLevel()

      • getBusList

        org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList<Bus> getBusList()
        Returns the value of the 'Bus List' reference list. The list contents are of type Bus. It is bidirectional and its opposite is 'Substation'. bus list containing bus objects
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Bus List' reference list.
        See Also:
        NetPackage.getSubstation_BusList(), Bus.getSubstation()

      • getNbNodeList

        org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList<NBNode> getNbNodeList()
        Returns the value of the 'Nb Node List' reference list. The list contents are of type NBNode. It is bidirectional and its opposite is 'Substation'. nbNode list containing nbNode objects
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Nb Node List' reference list.
        See Also:

        See Also:

      • buildBranchList

        java.util.List<Branch> buildBranchList(boolean inside)
        Build an across or inside branch list for the Substation. The implementation is based on the Substation.busList, and therefore is very efficient.
        Parameters:
        inside - if true, build an inside substation branch list. If false, build an across substation branch list.
